option.name: originalContent
option.value:
import yfinance as yf import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
# 원하는 날짜로 변경 가능 start_date = '2024-01-01' end_date = '2025-09-28'
df = yf.download('005930.KS', start=start_date, end=end_date) if df.empty: print('데이터가 없습니다.') else: plt.figure(figsize=(9, 6)) plt.subplot(2, 1, 1) plt.title('Samsung Electronics (Yahoo Finance)') plt.plot(df.index, df['Close'], 'c', label='Close') plt.plot(df.index, df['Adj Close'], 'b--', label='Adj Close') plt.legend(loc='best') plt.subplot(2, 1, 2) plt.bar(df.index, df['Volume'], color='g', label='Volume') plt.legend(loc='best') plt.show()

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
import yfinance as yf import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
# 원하는 날짜로 변경 가능 start_date = '2024-01-01' end_date = '2025-09-27' # 오늘보다 하루 전으로 설정
try: df = yf.download('005930.KS', start=start_date, end=end_date) if df.empty: print('데이터가 없습니다.') else: plt.figure(figsize=(9, 6)) plt.subplot(2, 1, 1) plt.title('Samsung Electronics (Yahoo Finance)') plt.plot(df.index, df['Close'], 'c', label='Close') plt.plot(df.index, df['Adj Close'], 'b--', label='Adj Close') plt.legend(loc='best') plt.subplot(2, 1, 2) plt.bar(df.index, df['Volume'], color='g', label='Volume') plt.legend(loc='best') plt.show() except Exception as e: print('에러 발생:', e)
